comments: Using the TPTP-4.2.0-200602130100 build, the Windows Perfmon agent fails to launch when using the IAC. Once the launch configuration is set up and profile is selected, the process terminates immediately. There are no models created during the process.

I received the following exception when launching the agent.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.osgi.internal.baseadaptor.BaseStorageHook.getBundleStore(BaseStorageHook.java:215)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.hyades.config.ConfigurationLoader.getBundleStoreDir(ConfigurationLoader.java:198)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.hyades.config.ConfigurationLoader.getBundleStoreDir(ConfigurationLoader.java:227)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.hyades.config.ConfigurationLoader.initializeGlobalVariables(ConfigurationLoader.java:339)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.hyades.config.ConfigurationLoader.<init>(ConfigurationLoader.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.hyades.impl.HyadesConfigurationProcessorImpl.<init>(HyadesConfigurationProcessorImpl.java:36)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.hyades.impl.HyadesProcessingModuleImpl.start(HyadesProcessingModuleImpl.java:129)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.impl.TrafficControllerImpl.startProcessingModules(TrafficControllerImpl.java:288)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.impl.TrafficControllerImpl.start(TrafficControllerImpl.java:181)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.impl.AgentControllerImpl.start(AgentControllerImpl.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.NodeImpl.connect(NodeImpl.java:279)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.ConnectUtil.connect(ConnectUtil.java:225)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.ConnectUtil.connect(ConnectUtil.java:336)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.util.PDCoreUtil.profileConnect(PDCoreUtil.java:986)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.util.PDCoreUtil.profileConnect(PDCoreUtil.java:998)
This issue has been remedied in the IAC in the 200602240100 build. Marking as fixed.
